msg: corpus-nightly should fall back to 'svn checkout' instead of 'svn update' if that is failing; 'svn co' is more fault-tolerant

author: lgawron
msg: make cocoon:deploy honour shielding settings for deploying in block testing environment
shieldCocoonWebapp checks for web.xml also in target directory (even if no web.xml in source directory
one can be generated by XPatchDeployer directly into target/)
- converted to inner class (only XPatchDeployer uses it)
- inherited from ByteArrayOutputStream (instead of delegation) which allows not to copy byte arrays
